definitions.body: [[רָמַת]] [[הַמִּחְפֶּה]] Jos 13:26 (P), in Gilead, on N. border of Gad; Arabwq [A Ramwq LXXL Rameq] kata\ Th\n Mas(sh)fa; = II. [[מִחְפֶּה]]
; on (dub.) identif. cf. GASM:Geogr. 586 f. Buhl:Geogr. 262.
[[רָאמַת נְ֫גֶב]] Jos 19:8 (P), Bameq [A LXXL Iameq] Kara\ li/ba(= [[בַּעֲלַת־בְּאֵר]] v:Jos 19:8, q.v. p. 128); prob. = [[רָמוֹת־נֶ֫גֶב]] 1Sa 30:27, Rama no/tou; site dub., v. Dr:Hast. DB. RAMAH.
